reviewText: The second DVD isn't a "bonus" disc if you're paying extra for it...

this is a awesome movie. dusty is back in this amazing sequel to the smash hit. this time dusty hurts himself where he can't race anymore and goes off to be certified as a firefighter to help the fire chief of his home town. disney does it again they make such awesome movies. i can't compare this one to the other they are both good. if you have not seen this movie then i recommend you do. wish they put el chupacabra in this one.

Do not waste your money for the bonus "DVD". This bonus DVD asks a series of questions to determine which planes fire and rescue character you are and then reveals it after the series of questions. That's all the bonus DVD is. Not worth the extra money at all. No other quick clips are included on the bonus disc. If you really want this combo, Walmart sells this combo for the same price as purchasing only the movie on Amazon. $24.99
